item.title: midi
item.description: midi scales calculate frequency from midi note (2*a)**(n/12 - 23/4) Implementation / Note A1 A2 A3 B3 C4 D4 E4 A4 A5 Volts/octave (V) 1.000 2.000 3.000 3.167 3.250 3.417 3.583 4.000 5.000 Hertz/volt (V) 1.000 2.000 4.000 4.490 4.757 5.339 5.993 8.000 16.000 The voltages are linked by the formula
